name: The Green Deal and ECO – how will it deliver?
description: Green Deal finance has been available since the beginning of 2013. How well is it doing, what are the obstacles and can it deliver the promised carbon reductions?

speakers.name: Paul King
speakers.occupation: Chief Executive, UK Green Building Council (UK-GBC)

speakers.name: Richard McCarthy
speakers.occupation: Executive Director for Central Government, Capita Symonds

speakers.name: Minister from Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC)
